title: Miracles Out of Mistakes | Joel Osteen
itunes:title: Miracles Out of Mistakes | Joel Osteen
description:
When we make mistakes, it’s easy to live in regret, thinking we’ve forfeited our destiny. But God didn’t base His plan for your life on your mistakes. He can take what should have limited you and use it to move you towards your purpose.

Your best days are still ahead, and together we can make a difference in this world with the message of God's hope and love.

To give visit JoelOsteen.com/GiveHope

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:

itunes:summary: When we make mistakes, God doesn’t abandon us.
itunes:author: Joel Osteen
